UniprotID	Q8N4F4-1
Accession	Q8N4F4;A0A087WWM3;C9JC66
EntryName	S22AO_HUMAN
ProteinName	Steroid transmembrane transporter SLC22A24 (Solute carrier family 22 member 24)
GeneName	SLC22A24
Length	322
Function	Renal transmembrane organic anion/dicarboxylate exchanger that participates in the reabsorption of conjugated steroids including estradiol-17beta-D-glucuronide (or 17beta-estradiol 17-O-(beta-D-glucuronate)), androstanediol glucuronide (or 5alpha-androstane-3alpha,17beta-diol 3-O-(beta-D-glucuronate)), and estrone 3-sulfate, as well as bile acids taurocholate and glycocholate, driven by an outward gradient of dicarboxylates such as glutarate or succinate.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane; Cell membrane
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure
